item.title: Getting started with firebase-authentication
item.description: How to Create Password Based User # You can use Firebase Authentication to let your users authenticate with Firebase using their email addresses and passwords, and to manage your app’s password-based accounts. In this example, we use these steps to set it up for our Android project which is based on JavaScript. But before doing so, this is what needs to get done before: Add Firebase to your JavaScript project. If you haven’t yet connected your app to your Firebase project, do so from the Firebase console.
